feed.title: Subatic Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Subatic: Public release 1.0
New release for Subatic: 2.4
entry.content:
• Docker Container Enhancements: Now supports both x86 and ARM architectures.
  • Dependency Overhaul: Eliminated all dependencies on cloud providers, including AWS SQS.
  • Local Tunneling Support: Introduced tunneling capabilities for S3 hosts for local development.
  • S3 Compatibility Testing: Verified compatibility with various S3-compatible providers, including AWS, Minio, Backblaze, and Cloudflare.
  • Architecture Diagram: Added a comprehensive architecture diagram for better understanding.
  • Analytics Integration: Introduced support for analytics features.
  • Migration Script Update: Migration scripts have been moved to the Docker container for improved accessibility.
  • File Size Support: Now supports files larger than 5GB.
  • Dashboard Enhancements: Added a status display in the dashboard to show progress during processing.

entry.title: New release for Subatic: 2.42
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bug fixes by @orthdron in https://github.com/orthdron/subatic/pull/19
  • Asset files by @orthdron in https://github.com/orthdron/subatic/pull/20

Full Changelog: https://github.com/orthdron/subatic/compare/2.4...2.42
